A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was looking forward to the movie since seeing episode 7\, but I was unimpressed by so much. Before I go through some of the bad let's start with the good. I thought the technology advancement like the mind melding and the tracking in light speed were brilliant. The acting overall was genuine and authentic. The story as a whole was underwhelming. I felt that everything that was built up in episode 7 was torn down in 8. Snok\, Rey's family\, the connection between Kylo and Rey was all just destroyed. I could go into more detail but others will have to make their own opinion.
